name: Build a School in Burma
content: Children who never attended school now attend school. Built a new school for 190 kids.

name: Build a School in India (Mata Balak)
Familia Hope Orphanage
content: Children can read and write.

name: Jagriti Vihara (Hospital for Hope)
content: All children can read or write. More efficient, tolerant, cooperative staff. Improvement in working skills.

name: Mubarika Campus
content: Higher retention rate for teachers. Building repairs and new furniture for classroms. Increased and safer access to education.

name: Nari Jagran Manch
content: 365 children can read and write

name: Nirvanavan Foundation
content: Better trained teachers to educate students. Migrant children have greater access to school. Number of students enroleld at school with library increased from 170-225.

name: Pa-O National Development Organization (PNDO)
content: 20 stuednts able to attend school. Children have greated access to education. Children able to continue education. Migrant students can attend school and eat 3 meals.

name: People First Educational Trust
content: Basic litearcy and numeracy. Sponsorships to graduation.

name: Prajna Vihara School
content: Children from lowest caste receive education. Quality of teachers has improved.

name: Siva Shanta Mother and Child Health Centre
content: Some children have enrolled in College.

name: Topu Honis Shelter Home
content: Residents are able to attend school and increase their quality of life. Residents learn job and life skills that increase quality of life.

name: Zakat Foundation of India
content: Children completing education.

name: Akili Dada
content: 71 academically gifted girls accessed high school education. Alumnae, scholars and fellows gain leadership skills.

name: ASFOP
content: 20 disable children got education. Children receive proper schooling.

name: Batsiranai
content: Children receive proper schooling. Learning to read, write and do math

name: Bitone Children's Center and Troupe
content: Help kids stay in school, graduate and get better grades

name: CAMME (Center to Help Exploited Youth)
content: Children who developed marketable skills can better thrive

name: El Shadai
content: Children can continue education, where as they couldn't before. Improved self-esteem and life skills.

name: Hlomelikusasa
content: Most children can read and write. 14 are educated

name: Ilela and Ngelenge School Committees
content: Improvement of classrooms. Improvement of teacher homes. Safer learning enviroment.

name: Khulani Special School
content: Educators know basic sign language and able to commnicate better with learners. Children receive education.

name: Kusoma International (LMEF)
content: Library construction. 6 scholars finished high school last year.

name: PING
content: Teens are competent in basic use of computer

name: Siyazigabisa Home of Hope
content: Rise in students' school marks

name: Tinga Tinga Secondary School
content: Childrens' school progress increased. Children with disabilites were enrolled in special school.

name: Bocas School Project
content: Expanded from 3 to 6 schools. Children served have tripled in size.

name: COMPALCIHT Association
content: Of the kids that graduated from preschool, 98% retention rate in primary schools. Training 40 youth to computing. Training 40 community health workers.

name: Crea+
content: We envision a world where we act together as a global community, to ensure all children have education, healthcare, and a safe home.

name: Girls to Women
content: Girls have a chance for better education. Provide after school programs and summer program for 45 people. Outdoor education for 45 people.

name: Global Chalkboard Project (Victor Hugo School)
content: Kids well assimilated to school environment, 65 of them can write. Kids receive education through the Bible.

name: P.E.T.I.S.O.S
content: 100% of students attend classes regularly.

name: Tadeo Torres
content: Children are supported at school. Children's fine and gross motor skills have improved.
